publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-8072 Bob Doris: Caldercuilt Youth Forum Awards—That the Parliament congratulates the organisers of the Caldercuilt Youth Forum on what it considers their tremendous success over the past year in attempting to meet the huge demand for community youth activities in the Maryhill area of Glasgow and extends warm wishes to the youngsters who won awards at the group’s first awards ceremony on 1 March 2011, including Robyn Hyslop, Eilidh Booth, Darren Erwin and Christopher Burton for the Senior Contribution Award, Shannon McLean, Connor Milne and James Brown for the Junior Contribution Award and Megan Clark for the Courage Award.

S3M-8072 Bob Doris: Caldercuilt Youth Forum Awards—That the Parliament congratulates the organisers of the Caldercuilt Youth Forum on what it considers their tremendous success over the past year in attempting to meet the huge demand for community youth activities in the Maryhill area of Glasgow and extends warm wishes to the youngsters who won awards at the group’s first awards ceremony on 1 March 2011, including Robyn Hyslop, Eilidh Booth, Darren Erwin and Christopher Burton for the Senior Contribution Award, Shannon McLean, Connor Milne and James Brown for the Junior Contribution Award and Megan Clark for the Courage Award. Supported by: Stewart Maxwell*, Bill Kidd*
S3M-8072 Caldercuilt Youth Forum Awards (lodged on 3 March 2011) Anne McLaughlin*
S3M-8072 Caldercuilt Youth Forum Awards (lodged on 3 March 2011) Jamie Hepburn*
